sourceFile.description: The name of the source file you want to overlay without an extension or folder path

items.description: A Color Name such as Red, or OrangeRed... or a Hex String

text.description: The text to be added to the banner. (i.e. Dev, Stage, Lite, Pro)

fontFamily.description: The name of a Font Family installed on the machine. This defaults to Arial

fontFile.description: The relative path to a font file to use.

opacity.description: The opacity of the banner over your icon. This is 0.95 by default

name.description: Defines the name of the output image or iconset without an extension

scale.description: Sets the scale from size of the source image to the largest output image

backgroundColor.description: Sets a background color to use for a transparent image if desired

width.description: Sets the desired width of the largest output image

height.description: Sets the desired height of the largest output image

padFactor.description: If set will change the largest image output size by changing the canvas size by the set factor. This should be greater than 1, like 1.5.

padColor.description: If set this will set a color to use on the background when adding a pad to your image

resourceType.description: This is only used for images on Android and will be set to Drawable by default
